name: Valletine against Darkne
description:
Travel with Valletine through several worlds to save your friends; from an enchanted forest to an icy world; with distinct enemies and various types of challenges along the way, help Valletine to save her friends from the terrible Darkne
Compatible with control and keyboard, explore various environments, such as slippery platforms or that disappear, try to escape from giant enemies or enemies so quickly that they test your reflexes. you will have to go through environments that slide controlling your personage, not to go fast and run into enemies ,o use platforms to be able to jump over enemies or reach places, you can not touch any enemy except one . When controlling Valletine, you must avoid enemies until you reach the final fight against Darkne.“For I know well the plans that I am drafting for you, says the Lord; plans for peace, not for evil, to give you a future and hope ”- Jehovah God
